visible_files.instructions:
Factorize a positive integer number into its prime factors.

For example:

	 2 -> [2]
	 3 -> [3]
	 4 -> [2,2]
	 6 -> [2,3]
	 9 -> [3,3]
	12 -> [2,2,3]
	15 -> [3,5]
